description: Reserved matters application for layout, scale, appearance of the buildings, and the landscaping of the proposal for 75 dwellings, 102 parking spaces and public open space, pursuant to outline planning permission 00143/A/P50 approved 30/03/2012 (for the extension of time for implementation of extant planning permission 00143/A/P45) which was granted on 30 March 2006 with a legal agreement (being for Variation of condition 3 (approval of reserved matters within 3 years) of date of permission 00143/A/P42 dated 11/4/2005), to allow for the extension of time limit to 6 years. (Outline application (Access Only) for the demolition of the existing stadium, the erection of residential development and creation of open space")
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (A_PL_PH_403 Rev 04, A_PL_PH_404 Rev 04, A_PL_PH_405 Rev 05, A_PL_PH_406 Rev 04, A_PL_PH_407 Rev 04, A_PL_PH_409 Rev 04, A_PL_PH_411 Rev 04, A_PL_PH_412 Rev 05, and Unnumbered Document dated 13.02.2018 from TateHindle Limited showing Building Elevations and Appearance to replace specific drawings within Design and Access Statement, June 2015 received: 2 March 2018. Drawings approved under 00143/A/P51 approved 21/09/2015: Code for Sustainable Homes Pre-Assessment Report, Landscape Statement, Sustainability Statement, 15117/S01 Rev. PL1, ESC1104/S003 Rev. P3, Statement of Community Involvement, Travel Plan, 15117/PH02 Rev. PL2, 15117/P01 Rev. PL2, 15117/D01 Rev. PL1, 15117/D02 Rev. PL1, 15117/D03 Rev. PL1, A_S_009 Rev. 00, A_S_008 Rev. 02, A_S_007 Rev. 02, A_S_006 Rev. 02, A_S_005 Rev. 03, A_S_004 Rev. 03, A_S_003 Rev. 02, A_S_002 Rev. 02, A_S_001 Rev. 01, A_SE_301 Rev. 03, A_SE_300 Rev. 02, A_EL_200 Rev. 02, A_EL_118 Rev. 02, A_EL_116 Rev. 02, A_EL_114 Rev. 03, A_EL_112 Rev. 02, A_EL_110 Rev. 02, A_EL_100 Rev. 02, A_EL_104 Rev. 02, A_EL_102 Rev. 02, A_EL_106 Rev. 02, A_EL_108 Rev. 02, A_PL_PH_400 Rev. 03, A_PL_PH_401 Rev. 03, A_PL_PH_402 Rev. 04, A_PL_PH_408 Rev. 03, A_PL_PH_410 Rev. 04, Received: 01 July 2015, Design and Access Statement, Transport Statement, Travel Plan Received: 06 July 2015, A_SE_300 Rev. 04, A_SE_301 Rev. 05 Received: 27 July 2015, Daylight/Sunlight Analysis Received: 31 July 2015 and A_SE_300 Rev. 07 Received: 02 September 2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 2 - Prior to commencement of construction works details of the arrangements for storing of refuse and waste recycling have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The arrangements for the storage of refuse and waste recycling shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with any approval given and shall be completed before any part of the accommodation hereby permitted is occupied.
Condition : 3 - The building shall not be occupied until a means of vehicular access has been constructed in accordance with the approved plans.

Condition : 4 - Prior to commencement of construction works details of the proposed cycle parking shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The arrangements for the cycle parking shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with any approval given and shall be completed before any part of the accommodation to which it relates, hereby permitted is occupied.
Condition : 5 - The development shall comply in full with the contents of the submitted and approved Energy Statement unless otherwise agreed beforehand in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - No construction works shall take place until samples and/or a specification of all the finishing materials to be used in any hard surfacing on the application site shall be submitted and approved in writing and thereafter undertaken in accordance with the approved scheme.

Condition : 7 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) 2015 (or any order revoking or re-enacting that order) no enlargement of the premises or any additional structures/buildings within the curtilage of the site shall be carried out.
Condition : 8 - Prior to occupation, a car parking management plan shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. These details shall be carried out as approved.
Condition : 9 - The windows formed in the side elevation of house number 54 shall be obscurely glazed, fixed shut and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscure glazing.
Condition : 10 - The development shall comply in full with the contents of the submitted and approved Landscaping Plan unless otherwise agreed beforehand in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 11 - The garage or car parking accommodation shown on drawing number A_S_006 Rev. 02 shall be provided before the dwelling to which it relates is occupied and thereafter it shall not be used for any purpose other than the parking of vehicles and storage of cycles, and refuse and recycling facilities. Visitor and on-street car parking shall be completed before the occupation of the final dwelling.

Condition : 12 - A Construction Environmental Management Plan shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to the implementation of development. The Construction Environmental Management Plan shall include a survey of the existing boundary treatment and details of the proposed repair and/or replacement works required as necessary. The Plan shall also include details of the final ground levels when measured from the nearest AOD and the heights of the buildings hereby approved shall not exceed the heights shown on the approved plans, when measured against the heights of the existing buildings surrounding the site shown on the section plans submitted. The construction of the proposed development shall then be carried out in accordance with the details set out within the approved Construction Environmental Management Plan.

Condition : 13 - Public open space and play areas shall be completed in accordance with the approved scheme and available for use prior to occupation of no more than 30% of units on the site and those areas shall not be used for any other purpose other than the approved use.
Condition : 14 - A 1.8m high screen shall be included on the eastern elevation of roof terrace, hereby approved at house number 55.

Condition : 15 - No resident of the development with the exception of house numbers 01, 02 and 75 shall obtain a resident's parking permit within the Brook Road South Controlled Parking Zone which may be in force in the area at any time or is subsequently extended.

Condition : 16 - Any flat roof areas not indicated as roof terraces or balconies on the plans hereby approved shall not be used as a balcony, roof terrace or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 17 - Any windows labelled as obscurely glazed on the plans hereby approved shall be obscurely glazed and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscure glazing.

Condition : 18 - Any new window formed in the side elevation of house numbers 54 and 75 at first floor level or above shall be non-opening unless parts of the window which can be opened are more than 1.7m above the floor of the room in which the window is installed.
